aboutMe: GET TO KNOW THE TYPE OF A PERSON THAT I AM ðŸ˜ŠMy name is Olwethu Malumla and I am grateful for your interest in my portfolio. Thank you for viewing my work and considering me for potential opportunities. As a full stack developer, I have expertise in both front-end and back-end development, with proficiency in languages like visual basic,MySQL,CSS and Java Script. My strengths lie in problem-solving, debugging, and team collaboration, which have enabled me to deliver high-quality solutions and collaborate effectively with teams. I'm passionate about staying up-to-date with industry trends and exploring new technologies to continuously improve my skills. I'm excited about the opportunity to join your respected company and contribute my skills and experience to drive innovation and success. I seek challenging opportunities where I can fully use my skills for the progress of the organization to obtain entry level position in this field and utilize the theoretical and pratical education Iâ€™ve obtained so far. I am highly driven, I have great communication skills, I bring an environment that encourages others and that allows me to grow.Improving my skills, experiences and capabilities is my everyday job.

education.description: I am a current student at life choices academy learning full stack software developer
I studied PC TECHNICIAN AND NETWORK+ at Northlink College and the had a 6 months intenship at that very same institution
I studied CYBERSECURITY ESSENTIALS at Northlink College as an extra course while I was doing my practicals as a PC TECHNICIAN intern.
I studied Information Technology and Computer Science (NQF level 2-4) at FalseBay College
I attended high school(grade 8-12) at Aloe High School

skill.Resilience: I refuse to let set backs disturb my goals.

testimonials.message: Olwethu is a dedicated and curious professional who consistently seeks opportunities to grow and improve. Her positive energy, exceptional work ethic, keen intellect, passion for learning and collaborative spirit make her a valuable asset to any team.

Olwethu's willingness to take on challenges and ask questions is truly admirable. Her inquisitive nature not only benefits her own learning but also fosters a culture of clarity and understanding among her peers.

I really like how Olwethu isnâ€™ t afraid of challenges and always wants to learn more. Her habit of asking questions not only benefits her own learning journey but also encourages others to seek clarity and understanding.

I  have had the pleasure of working alongside Olwethu Malumla for quite some time now, and I must say their dedication and work ethic are truly inspiring. She consistently goes above and beyond in every task they undertake, demonstrating not only their expertise but also their passion for their work.Their positive attitude and willingness to help others make them a valuable asset to our team. It's a privilege to work with someone as talented and reliable as Olwethu.

In the short amount of time I've known Olwethu, I've seen how smart, hardworking, funny as well as playful she is. Olwethu has a way of charming people, she makes you feel at peace with her presence and can be quite a comforting person. It's been a pleasure knowing her and still getting to know her. She has grown so much since the first day of us learning and I'm excited to see how much she will still grow. Her hardwork and dedication towards coding always amazes me because she never gives up even when she hits a wall, she overcomes that challenge and continues moving on with a smile on her face.

Working alongside Olweth has been an absolute pleasure. Their dedication to their work is truly inspiring. She consistently goes above and beyond to ensure that tasks are completed with excellence and attention to detail. Olwethu is not only reliable but also proactive in finding solutions and contributing fresh ideas to our projects. Their positive attitude and willingness to support the team make her an invaluable asset. I have no doubt that Olwethu will continue to excel in their endeavors and positively impact any team they are a part of.
